text: Abo bonna mu bakyala ba mmwe abatakyagenda mu nsonga za Heidh, bw emutankananga ebbanga lya Idda yaabwe, balindenga emyezi esatu. Wabula abo abatanayingira mu nsonga za Haidh Idda yaabwe emyezi esatu. Naye abo abali embuto ebbanga lyabwe kumala kuzaala. Oyo yenna atya Katonda amuteerawo obwangu mu buli kintu
